original_text: But he did that which was evil in the sight of the Lord, as did Manasseh his father: for Amon sacrificed unto all the carved images which Manasseh his father had made, and served them;
korean_text: 그의 아버지 므낫세의 행함 같이 여호와 보시기에 악을 행하여 아몬이 그의 아버지 므낫세가 만든 아로새긴 모든 우상에게 제사하여 섬겼으며

sentences.original_text: But he did that which was evil
in the sight of the Lord
for Amon sacrificed unto all the carved images
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 아몬이 그의 아버지 므낫세가 만든 모든 새긴 우상에게

sentences.original_text: which Manasseh his father had made
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 아버지 므낫세가 만든 모든 새긴 우상에게
